mapper.update: UPDATE t_use_list SET cost = #{cost}, use_yn = CASE WHEN #{cost} = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END WHERE use_list_id = #{useListId}
mapper.select: select C.name,A.cost,B.cost_category costCategoryId,A.use_list_id useListId from t_use_list as A inner join t_monthly_goal as B on A.goal_id=B.goal_id inner join t_not_todo_list as C on C.not_todo_id=B.not_todo_id where date_format(date,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{date}
